data.prompt: I have no doors but I can be entered. No rooms but I have space. What am I?

data.prompt: I am not alive, but I grow; I have no lungs, but I need air; what am I?

data.prompt: I am not alive, but I grow; I have no lungs, but I need air; what am I?

hints.hintText: Central corridors may link dead ends.
The exit is not near the start.
Some flags have red in common.
Think which sports are played outdoors.
Named for the Roman god of war.
You say it only once per minute.
Twice in a moment, never in a thousand years.
Backtrack if you reach a wall.
Dead ends can teach you routes.
Goal is far from starting line.
Check every exit on an island.
Shiny ones are rare in real life.
Some vehicles are for public transport.
The yellow one is usually a taxi.
Red flags are not just warnings!
It's not Mars, but still rocky.
It's the longest river in the world.
It's in the colors of the rainbow.
You use it in the kitchen.
Can be made of cellulose or plastic.
Once you use it, it can't travel again.
Small but can cross the globe.
Named for the Roman god of war.
You say it only once per minute.
Twice in a moment, never in a thousand years.
